welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Newstead, where history and natural beauty come together. Get ready to experience our quaint town and discover its hidden gems. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buffalo Niagara International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Buffalo Niagara International Airport is used for overflow and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Niagara Falls International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
